hero.title: Products, education, and technical support for salons & barbershops.
hero.lede: PT Alfa Beauty is a professional beauty distribution company dedicated to providing products, education, and technical support for salons and barbershops in Indonesia.
points: Curated portfolio: professional brands selected for consistent real‑world performance.
Education & support: practical training and technical guidance for your team.
WhatsApp-first consultation: recommendations and ordering without public pricing.
hero.note: No public pricing. For consultation and product recommendations, contact us via WhatsApp.

about.title: About
about.body: PT Alfa Beauty is a professional beauty distribution company dedicated to providing products, education, and technical support for salons and barbershops in Indonesia. We represent carefully selected international brands and work as a strategic partner to professionals, ensuring every product we distribute delivers consistent performance and is supported by proper technical knowledge.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: To provide professional beauty partners with premium cosmetic products and comprehensive business support, enabling their success in the beauty industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: To become Indonesia's leading B2B beauty distribution platform, recognized for quality products, reliable service, and empowering partnerships.

quality.title: Quality
quality.body: We curate only the finest cosmetic products that meet international standards.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.body: We grow together with our partners, providing education and continuous support.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.body: We strive for operational excellence in every aspect of our business.

cta.title: Ready to Partner With Us?
cta.body: Join thousands of beauty professionals who trust Alfa Beauty for their business needs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For consultation, product recommendations, and partnership inquiries, reach us via WhatsApp.

form.consentSuffix: and consent to the processing of my personal data.
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

whatsapp.body: Fastest response. Chat with our team directly.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.body: Our team is ready to help you grow your beauty business. Reach out today and let's discuss how we can support your success.

becomePartner.title: Become a Partner
becomePartner.lede: Tell us a bit about your business. Our team will follow up within 24 hours.

next.title: What happens next
items: We review your details and reach out via WhatsApp/phone/email.
We recommend suitable products and training options.
No public pricing — consultation happens via WhatsApp.

becomePartner.formLede: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you within 1-2 business days.
becomePartner.privacyNote: Your information is secure. We respect your privacy and will only use your data to process your partnership application.

products.lede: Curated products for salons and barbershops. No public pricing — contact us via WhatsApp for consultation and recommendations.

highlights.title: Featured products
highlights.lede: A quick look at our curated portfolio.

empty.title: No results

consultCta.body: Message us on WhatsApp for consultation, product recommendations, and ordering.

intro.body: Alfa Beauty Cosmetica is committed to protecting our partners and welcomes vulnerability reports from security researchers.

disclosure.title: Vulnerability Disclosure
disclosure.body: If you believe you have discovered a vulnerability, please report it to us via email at:

guidelines.title: Reporting Guidelines
items: Provide a detailed description of the vulnerability.
Include steps to reproduce the issue (PoC).
Do not access or modify data that does not belong to you.

safeHarbor.title: Safe Harbor
safeHarbor.body: We will not pursue legal action against researchers who report vulnerabilities in good faith and in accordance with this policy.

response.title: Response Timeline
response.body: We aim to acknowledge receipt of your report within 24 hours and evaluate severity within 5 business days.

intro.body: PT. Alfa Beauty Cosmetica ('we', 'our') is committed to protecting your personal data in compliance with the Personal Data Protection Law (UU No. 27 of 2022). This policy explains how we process your information.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Data Collection
items: Identity Data: Business name, contact person, city, and salon type.
Contact Data: WhatsApp number and email address.
Technical Data: IP address, browser type, and interaction metrics (via Vercel and Sentry).

howWeUse.title: 2. Purpose of Processing
items: To process partnership applications and verify business legitimacy.
To facilitate B2B consultation and product ordering via WhatsApp.
To comply with legal obligations (e.g., tax reporting).
To improve platform security and performance.

storageSecurity.title: 3. Storage & Retention
storageSecurity.body: Your data is stored securely in Supabase (AWS) infrastructure. We retain partnership data as long as the business relationship exists or as required by Indonesian law (minimum 5 years for financial records).

cookies.title: 4. Cookies & Analytics
cookies.body: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics to understand usage patterns. You may disable cookies in your browser settings.

contact.title: 5. User Rights (UU PDP)
contact.body: Under UU PDP, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at: alfabeautycosmeticaa@gmail.com.

intro.body: By accessing this website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please discontinue use immediately.

websiteUse.title: 1. B2B Platform
websiteUse.body: This platform is intended solely for professional salons, barbershops, and beauty distributors in Indonesia. It is not for general consumer retail.

noPublicPricing.title: 2. Pricing & Ordering
noPublicPricing.body: We do not publish public price lists to protect our B2B partners. Final pricing is confirmed only via official WhatsApp invoices or Facture.

limitations.title: 3. Disclaimer of Warranties
limitations.body: The content is provided 'as is'. While we strive for accuracy, we do not warrant that product descriptions or educational content are error-free.

changes.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
changes.body: PT. Alfa Beauty Cosmetica shall not be liable for any indirect damages arising from the use of this website. Our liability is limited to the extent permitted by Indonesian law.

hub.title: Education & Events
hub.heroBody: We invest in education because we believe that informed professionals deliver exceptional results. Join our workshops, seminars, and training programs.
hub.trainingNote: Want training for your team? Message us on WhatsApp and tell us your city and needs.

notFound.title: Event Not Found
notFound.body: The event you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.

event.note: Note: For workshops and training, please bring your own tools.
event.contactBody: Spaces are limited. Contact us to reserve your spot.

notFound.title: Article not found
notFound.body: We couldn't find that article. Please return to Education.

article.footer: Need guidance for a specific product? Send your questions via WhatsApp.

sidebar.body: Explore more educational content from our beauty experts.

consult.body: No public pricing. Message us on WhatsApp for suitability, usage guidance, and ordering.
